faculty.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a department or group of related departments within a university
faculty.translation[0].definitions[1].de: all the teachers in a university
faculty.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Both faculty and students oppose the measures.
faculty.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a natural ability, such as the ability to see, hear, or think clearly
faculty.translation[0].definitions[2].no: in full possession of all your faculties (=able to see, hear, think etc in the normal way)
faculty.translation[0].definitions[3].de: a particular skill that someone has
faculty.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: She had a great faculty for absorbing information.
